title: Coat Drive Sponsored by PGPD’s Community Services Division, One Warm Coat, and Homeless Outreach, Inc. has Successful Results
body:
One Warm Coat is a national non-profit organization that supports and encourages coat drives.  It helps both individuals and groups collect coats and deliver them to local agencies that then distribute the coats, free of charge, to those in need.  Since its inception in 1992,  has helped to collect and distribute more than one million coats.  
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
